name: A. Even Odds
statement:
Being a nonconformist, Volodya is displeased with the current state of
things, particularly with the order of natural numbers (natural number
is positive integer number). He is determined to rearrange them. But
there are too many natural numbers, so Volodya decided to start with the
first . He writes down the following sequence of numbers: firstly all
odd integers from to (in ascending order), then all even integers from
to (also in ascending order). Help our hero to find out which number
will stand at the position number .
